comment.author: 7943225@N02
comment._content: Any  even approximate date on this?

comment.realname: University of Washington Libraries Digital Collections
comment.author: 8337233@N06
comment._content: Unfortunately, we don't have a date on this specific menu, however, most information found about the restaurant chain's history would place this postcard some time in the 1930's. The flagship restaurant opened in Hollywood in 1927 as a candy counter for theater patrons (the theater was next door and at that time theaters did not have their own concessions). We also have a photograph of the dancing pig on a sign outside a location in Seattle some time in the 1920's. content.lib.washington.edu/u?/imlsmohai,3342
